title: ADC wished me CANCER
body:
I was mid , i left lane and said SS , bot had no wards, started flaming and wished cancer etc.

BUT IN THE END 

I denied that fucker 2 FUCKING PENTAS xD

HOLY SHIT I NEVER LAUGHED IN A GAME LIKE THIS BEFORE xD 

Her last words :

" diee for take cancerr and gl "

She trash talked all enemy team too ingame. GET REKT FLAMER !!!!

replies.body: ye nice bro u got him good gottem real good done well man grats ur champion a deadset hero of justice the grandest white knight that ever lived
Sure did a number on the adc hahaha
